I open a modal qx.ui.window.Window with a button. I click on the application "in the background" than press TAB. The normal behaviour is that the focus jumps to the button in the window. But somtimes the focus jumps to a focusable element in the backround. If the focused element is a textfield, I can edit it, if this is a button I can click it with the spacebar!
I've tested this on Firefox 3.6, Firefox 9 - Mac, Opera - Mac, IE7 - winXP. Under Opera there is no normal behaviour, under other browsers I have to press TAB quickly after clicking on background.
Unfortunatelly I couldn't reproducate this in the playground, but I found another strange behaviour that probably has something to do with the issue: http://tinyurl.com/8yxhrpa
Tristan Koch's answer on the nabble: "Moving your sample code to a stand-alone application demonstrates the issue (tested with Chrome)"
